help: Enables to specify if the product (usually received) answers the request.
Box to be checked in order to automatically generate a new stock movement, in case of a surplus in the quantity of a product (after actual values have been entered).
Box to be checked in order to automatically generate a new stock movement, in case of insufficient quantity of a product (after actual values have been entered).
For supplier arrivals only. This field enables to select the departure address for stock movements, among addresses recorded in the supplier's form.
Enables to specify if the product (usually received) answers the request.
Box to be checked in order to exclude products for which the stock quantity equals 0 from inventory lines.
Box to be checked in order to allow automatic generation of a tracking number from a configurable sequence.
Enables to specify the product quantity (in product unit) which will be batched under the same tracking number. By default, this number is set to 1.
Box to be checked in order to allow automatic generation of a tracking number from a configurable sequence.
Enables to specify the product quantity (in product unit) which will be batched under the same tracking number. By default, this number is set to 1.
Box to be checked in order to allow automatic generation of a tracking number from a configurable sequence.
Box to be checked in order to specify that the tracking number attached to a product on a customer order will be automatically selected, observing a rule regarding entry into inventory (FIFO/LIFO).
Enables to specify whether, in the case of sale, the most ancient (FIFO) or most recent (LIFO) tracking number will be selected.
Enables to specify the product quantity (in product unit) which will be batched under the same tracking number. By default, this number is set to 1.
If this option is activated, when a logistic form goes to the collected status, the customer delivery automatically changes to the status "Realized".
Allows you to enter your customer number to the carriers companies.
By checking this box, an email will automatically be sent when performing a stock movement. You can select the message template that will be sent.
